ComicInfo.Summary: Another Piece of the Action Part 1: After helping to defeat Kahless, Worf is hoping for he and his crew to be reinstated into Starfleet. However, due to their rogue actions, they are discharged from Starfleet, but are given command of the Defiant to take on an important mission that Starfleet cannot be associated with for fear of disrupting diplomatic relations with other races.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-26 16:55:21. [CVDB1021491] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:00:22. [Issue ID 2571563]
